DOC.brief_title: Study Nivolumab Subjects With Relapsed Refractory Follicular Lymphoma ( FL ) ( CheckMate 140 )
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Grade 1 , 2 , 3a FL without pathologic evidence transformation Male female , age 18 , relapse refractory FL lymphoma > =2 prior treatment line ; 2 prior treatment line must include least CD20 antibody and/or alkylating agent Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status ( PS ) 01 Known central nervous system lymphoma History interstitial lung disease Subjects active , know suspected autoimmune disease Prior allogeneic stem cell transplant Prior autologous stem cell transplant â‰¤12 week prior first dose study drug
